# Draft:Towards a Metalanguage of Evil

"Towards a Metalanguage of Evil" is the title of an essay by American artist Cady Noland, first published in print in 1989. Originally developed as a slide presentation for an academic conference in 1987, the essay explores... Noland expanded the essay following its first publication and adapted the expanded version as a three-dimensional art installation for the contemporary art exhibition Documenta in 1991.
